item.title: Sir Brian's fortunes are down £14m
item.author: The Press and Journal
item.description:
Stagecoach co- founder Sir Brian Souter lost more than £14 million on his investments last year.
The entrepreneur holds the majority of his wealth in Souter Investments Limited, with accounts for the year ending March 31 showing a pre-tax loss of £14.3m.
The fund's largest investment used to be in...
